Package org.extricate.minimud

Class Summary
Connection Handles individual connections to the Minimud (Each connection has its own Connection class)
Controller The overall controller for the Minimud.
drop Allows a player to drop a mud object in their room
east Class to handle a player wishing to move east
emote Class to handle a player wishing to express emotion
get Allows a player to pick up a mud object which is in the room
help Sends the player the "help" text (playing.txt)
inventory Gives a player a listing of their current inventory
look Gives the player a description of their current location
mudcommand The basic class for all commands on MiniMUD.
mudobject The basic class for all the objects on the MiniMUD.
north Class to handle a player wishing to move north
Player Handles all player related routines, with the inclusion of sending messages to players.
quit Allows a user to quit the game nicely
say Says something to all players in the same room.
Server A very basic MUD (Multi User Dungeon) server, designed to be accessed by clients using the "telnet" protocol.
shout "Shouts" a message to all the players on the MUD.
south Class to handle a player wishing to move south
user Allows the user to change their name
west Class to handle a player wishing to move west
who Tells the player who is currently playing the MUD
